Find key Microsoft reports in one place, alongside related disclosures and resources. Our approach Sustainability reports Trusted technology reports Additional reports Key reports Microsoft Digital Defense Report Read the 2025 digital defense report Environmental Sustainability Report Read the 2025 sustainability report The Microsoft Impact Summary Read the 2025 Microsoft Impact Summary Microsoft Annual Report Read the 2025 Annual Report Our approach to reporting As we work to help everyone achieve more, we are committed to improving our world and reporting our progress. Throughout our organization, people at Microsoft work to conduct business in ways that are principled, transparent, and accountable. More about our reporting governance Company and shareholder data Get to know more about Microsoft, including our history and where we operate. We also maintain access to our financial disclosures and shareholder reports on our Investor Relations website, including the latest annual report and proxy statement. Facts about Microsoft View the latest investor reports Public policy engagement Microsoft strives to be a leader in accountability and transparency in the public policy process. This includes publicly disclosing our policy and advocacy contributions related to our public policy engagement in the US. View contributions and learn more Sustainability reports Climate change is the defining issue of our generation, and addressing it requires swift, collective action and technological innovation. We are committed to meeting our own goals while helping to enable others to do the same. That means taking responsibility for our operational footprint and accelerating progress through technology. California AB 1305 Report Trusted technology reports We are committed to upholding the highest standards of trust, safety, and responsible business standards as we develop and deploy technology, and report publicly on our progress.
